verses.roman:
hari-dhvani kari' sabe kailā āsvādana
āsvādite preme matta ha-ila sabāra mana

synonyms: hari-dhvani kari'-loudly resounding the holy name of Hari; sabe—all of them; kailā āsvādana—tasted; āsvādite—as soon as they tasted; preme—in ecstatic love; matta—maddened; ha-ila—became; sabāra mana—the minds of all.
translation: Loudly chanting the holy name of Hari, all of them tasted the prasāda. As they tasted it, their minds became mad in the ecstasy of love.
